name: Mission: Shoot
description:
You are on a mission to stop the evil powers which are trying to steal data from the government. The only way to stop them is to destroy all their databases which wont be easy as they already await you with their turrets.

Can you stop their evil plan?


Controls:

WASD - To move

RMB - To shoot

PS: I know gameplay trailer sucks. I just don't have an even average pc at home.
